title: ABI checker has false positives in source compatibility

content.raw:
Here is an example comparing `gazebo8` to `gazebo8`:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/413/

The [report](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/413/API_ABI_report/) shows no problems with binary compatibility, but shows [89 problems with source compatibility](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/413/API_ABI_report/compat_report.html#SourceTab)

## Added symbols:

### Base64.hh

Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

* _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
* Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> const&)

Base64Encode ( char const* _bytesToEncode, unsigned int _len, std::__cxx11::string& _result )

* _Z12Base64EncodePKcjRNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
* Base64Encode(char const*, unsigned int, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>&)

...

## Removed symbols:

###Base64.hh

Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

* _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE
* Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)

Base64Encode ( char const* _bytesToEncode, unsigned int _len, std::__cxx11::string& _result )

* _Z12Base64EncodePKcjRNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE
* Base64Encode(char const*, unsigned int, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >&)

...
content.html:
Here is an example comparing gazebo8 to gazebo8:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/413/

The report shows no problems with binary compatibility, but shows 89 problems with source compatibility

Added symbols:

Base64.hh

Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

  • _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
  • Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> const&)

Base64Encode ( char const* _bytesToEncode, unsigned int _len, std::__cxx11::string& _result )

  • _Z12Base64EncodePKcjRNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
  • Base64Encode(char const*, unsigned int, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>&)

...

Removed symbols:

###Base64.hh

Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

  • _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE
  • Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)

Base64Encode ( char const* _bytesToEncode, unsigned int _len, std::__cxx11::string& _result )

  • _Z12Base64EncodePKcjRNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE
  • Base64Encode(char const*, unsigned int, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >&)

...
